docs.snippet: Russia will be represented in most sports at the Rio Olympics, with 271 of its sportsmen and women cleared to participate ahead of the opening ceremony, Russian Olympic Committee (ROC) head Alexander Zhukov said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia will be represented in most sports at the Rio Olympics, with 271 of its sportsmen and women cleared to participate ahead of the opening ceremony, Russian Olympic Committee (ROC) head Alexander Zhukov said on Thursday.

headline.main: Russia Says 271-Strong Team Will Be Cleanest at Rio
headline.print_headline: Russia Says 271-Strong Team Will Be Cleanest at Rio

docs.snippet: Four-times breaststroke world champion Yulia Efimova was handed an Olympic lifeline on Thursday when the Court of Arbitration for Sport partially upheld her appeal against a Games ban....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four-times breaststroke world champion Yulia Efimova was handed an Olympic lifeline on Thursday when the Court of Arbitration for Sport partially upheld her appeal against a Games ban.

headline.main: Exclusive : CAS Partially Upholds Olympic Appeal of Russian Swimmer Efimova
headline.print_headline: Exclusive : CAS Partially Upholds Olympic Appeal of Russian Swimmer Efimova

docs.snippet: The IOC approved the entry of 271 Russian athletes for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics on Thursday, meaning 70 percent of the country's original team will compete after a doping scandal that has dominated the buildup to the games....
docs.lead_paragraph: The IOC approved the entry of 271 Russian athletes for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics on Thursday, meaning 70 percent of the country's original team will compete after a doping scandal that has dominated the buildup to the games.

headline.main: IOC Approves Entry of 271 Russian Athletes for Rio Games
headline.print_headline: IOC Approves Entry of 271 Russian Athletes for Rio Games

docs.snippet: Belgian international Kevin De Bruyne has warned it may take time for new coach Pep Guardiola to build a side and implement his playing style at Manchester City....
docs.lead_paragraph: Belgian international Kevin De Bruyne has warned it may take time for new coach Pep Guardiola to build a side and implement his playing style at Manchester City.

headline.main: Guardiola Impact at Man City May Take Time-De Bruyne
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Impact at Man City May Take Time-De Bruyne

docs.snippet: NBC, a unit of Comcast Corp, has sold $1.2 billion in advertising for the Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, the network said on the eve of a rare Games where some of the most high-profile contests will air live in prime time for U.S. audiences....
docs.lead_paragraph: NBC, a unit of Comcast Corp, has sold $1.2 billion in advertising for the Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, the network said on the eve of a rare Games where some of the most high-profile contests will air live in prime time for U.S. audiences.

headline.main: NBC Has Sold $1.2 Billion in Olympics Advertising
headline.print_headline: NBC Has Sold $1.2 Billion in Olympics Advertising

docs.snippet: Adidas Chief Executive Herbert Hainer said on Thursday he was confident that the German sportswear group could keep growing fast and improve profitability as he prepares to hand over to former Henkel boss Kasper Rorsted....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adidas Chief Executive Herbert Hainer said on Thursday he was confident that the German sportswear group could keep growing fast and improve profitability as he prepares to hand over to former Henkel boss Kasper Rorsted.

headline.main: Adidas Boss Optimistic His Successor Can Maintain Growth
headline.print_headline: Adidas Boss Optimistic His Successor Can Maintain Growth

docs.snippet: Pre-Olympics media reports about the Zika virus, polluted water and political unrest in Brazil raised awareness about the Rio de Janeiro Games and thus helped NBC's advertising sales, network executives said Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pre-Olympics media reports about the Zika virus, polluted water and political unrest in Brazil raised awareness about the Rio de Janeiro Games and thus helped NBC's advertising sales, network executives said Thursday.

headline.main: NBC Says Negative Stories Raise Rio Awareness, Help Ad Sales
headline.print_headline: NBC Says Negative Stories Raise Rio Awareness, Help Ad Sales

docs.snippet: The troubled preparations for the Rio Olympics proved that the model for the Games could withstand the toughest challenges but the IOC hoped it would not have to face such a stress test again, president Thomas Bach said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The troubled preparations for the Rio Olympics proved that the model for the Games could withstand the toughest challenges but the IOC hoped it would not have to face such a stress test again, president Thomas Bach said on Thursday.

headline.main: Rio Games Preparation Chaos Hopefully a One-Off Event : IOC
headline.print_headline: Rio Games Preparation Chaos Hopefully a One-Off Event : IOC

docs.snippet: The mayor of a town outside Marseille said Thursday he intends to ban a swim-day for women at a local park next month, citing a risk to public order because swimmers will be required to cover up from chest to knee....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mayor of a town outside Marseille said Thursday he intends to ban a swim-day for women at a local park next month, citing a risk to public order because swimmers will be required to cover up from chest to knee.

headline.main: Swim-Day for Women Near Marseille Prompts Ban Call
headline.print_headline: Swim-Day for Women Near Marseille Prompts Ban Call
